author: Jasmine Gearie
title: Secretlab's excellent Titan gaming chair is massively discounted
description: Secretlab is taking AU$30 off its latest 2020 Series, while the 2018 range sees discounts of up to AU$150.
content: Governments around the world are asking everyone to stay indoors to help curb the spread of the novel coronavirus, and Australia is no different. With lockdown laws in place, and many of us now either working from home, or having more time on our hands indoor… [+2755 chars]
